Name: Click-chan
About the game: Click-chan is an adorable mouse helper who allows you to do an array of mouse tricks. Turbo Turbo mode allows you to click faster than normal, this is specially helpful for tasks that require smashing down your mouse button! Burst Mode This mode allows you to click in bursts, which is specially helpful in games where precision matters. Single Click Click-chan helps you convert a key into your click, it helps in cases such as games with super precise shooting like snipers.
